item.title: Machine Learning Models for the Analysis of Transport Phenomena
item.author: thiagoneye@outlook.com (Thiago Rodrigues)
item.description: Development of machine learning models aimed at pattern identification, incorporating constraints and principles derived from physical laws.

item.title: Modal Analysis of Fluid Dynamics
item.author: thiagoneye@outlook.com (Thiago Rodrigues)
item.description: Application of the Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD) technique to identify and understand coherent structures (or modes) that dominate the spatial and temporal behavior of a fluid flow.

item.title: Numerical Methods for Simulating Transport Phenomena
item.author: thiagoneye@outlook.com (Thiago Rodrigues)
item.description: Application of numerical methods (such as finite differences, finite volumes, and finite elements) for the simulation of transport phenomena, including fluid dynamics and heat transfer.

item.title: Numerical Modeling and Characterization of Oil Reservoirs
item.author: thiagoneye@outlook.com (Thiago Rodrigues)
item.description: Computational representation of the physical and geological characteristics of oil wells.
